overview: PMI (Project Management Institute) is a global nonprofit professional organization for project management. It offers various certifications, standards, and resources for project managers.
core_features: PMI provides a range of certifications such as Project Management Professional (PMP), Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM), and Program Management Professional (PgMP). It also develops standards like the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK) Guide and provides resources for project management professionals.
